document_data.name: Zzar
document_data.mainbody: '''Zzar''' was a fortified [[sherry]] wine popular in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Description: Zzar had a fiery orange color and an almond scent and flavor. Many elves disdained it, considering it vulgar.
document_data.Availability:
Zzar was produced at wineries such as the [[House of Good Spirits]] in Waterdeep.

It was also available from the [[Yawning Portal]], where it was commonly ordered by [[Esvele Rosznar]].
